products.title: 303 Aerospace Protectant - 473mL - 30382
products.body_html:
Originally engineered for aerospace and aviation applications, new 303(R) Automotive Protectant provides superior UV protection for any rubber, vinyl, and plastic surfaces of your vehicle, such as your dashboard, windshield wiper blades, and even your tyres. Unlike many protectants that leave greasy residues, 303(R) Automotive Protectant dries to a clear matte finish without that sticky, shiny slick feeling.

303(R) Automotive Protectant not only protects against fading, discoloration and cracking from harmful UV rays, but repels dust and stains, too. Simply spray on and wipe dry for a beautiful, matte finish. Best of all, each application will last up to 30-45 days.

Great for use on a variety of surfaces such as: vinyl, plastics, synthetic and natural rubber, leather, eisenglass, PVC, gel coat and fibreglass. Ideal for use on your dashboard, other vinyl/leather interior surfaces of your car, tyres, windshield wiper blades and more!
products.tags: 303, Best Sellers, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Care, Interior Care

products.title: 303 All Surface Automotive Interior Cleaner - 473mL - 30588
products.body_html:
303 Interior Cleaner is a great cleaner for all of the interior surfaces of your vehicle. It is gentle and safe, but still has the strength to clean away tough stains. It lifts dirt from the surface when sprayed on, and wipes off residue free. This formula also helps repel dust and dirt, and leaves a clean natural appearance on the surface after using.

303 Interior Cleaner is safe and effective on: vinyl, plastic, rubber, leather, fabrics/upholstery, carpets, glass, and even LCD screens.
products.tags: 303, Best Sellers, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Care, Interior Care

products.title: 303 Graphene Nano Spray Coating - 709mL - 30238 (Pickup Only)
products.body_html:
303(R) Graphene Nano Spray Coating(TM) is a graphene oxide-based coating, that will provide a high level of protection for 12 months. This product also reduces the surface temperature, which will reduce the amount of hard water spots you get on your car's paint. It features a high-water contact angle, producing substantial hydrophobic properties, that keep the water from sticking to your paint. After application, the paint will have enhanced gloss and clarity, too.

The main differentiation of this product vs. others in the market is the combined durability and protection, along with how simple and easy it is to use! It bonds to the surface without prior paint correction or decontamination and is difficult to mess up application. Sprayed it on and let it sit too long, or missed a spot when buffing it off? No problem just come back and buff the remaining product off. No need for machine correction of high spots. It can also be applied in direct sunlight. Applying it in direct sunlight can even make the application process easier, as the heat helps the product cure faster. It can be used on multiple surfaces including paint, glass, wheels, trim, and more!

303(R) Graphene Nano Spray Coating(TM) works in these ways:
Paint: Coats and protects the paint from scratches, leaving a hard layer of protection
Glass: Protects glass from minor chips and cracks, repels water while driving
Wheels: Repels brake dust and helps keep your wheels looking clean (use an applicator to apply product to wheels - avoid contact with brake pads/discs and tyre tread)
Trim: Preserves and protects plastic
products.tags: 303, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Care, new__tag_Pickup Only, Pickup Only, tag__new_Pickup Only, Wash, Wax & Polish

products.title: 303 Hi-Tech Outdoor Fabric Guard - 473mL - 30605 (Pickup Only)
products.body_html:
303 Fabric Guard keeps fabrics fresh, soft, colourful and breathable - all while adding a powerful coating to repel water and prevent the most serious of stains. Use it to keep rugs clean, leather interiors fresh and covers blemish-free. You can even spray it on your convertible top's seams to prevent wicking. When applied to clean and dry fabrics, 303 Fabric Guard restores lost water and stain repellency to straight-from-the-factory levels. Keep all your favourite fabrics crisp and clean for years to come.

Note: Contents are flammable and therefore unsuitable for shipping - pickup only.
products.tags: Boxing Day Sale 2025, Exception Product

products.title: 303 Leather 3-in-1 Complete Care - 473mL - 30218
products.body_html:
303(R) Automotive Leather 3-in-1 Complete Care cleans, conditions and provides UV protection to all finished leather and vinyl. It will help clean up surface dirt and grime, as will help repel future dust, lint and stains. It also contains superior UV protection to prevent fading and cracking of the leather caused by the sun's harmful UV rays. Easy to use formula, just spray on and wipe off.
303 3 in 1 Leather Complete Care is safe to use on a variety of surfaces, such as:
- Finished leather or vinyl auto interiors
- Leather furniture
- Leather shoes
- Leather luggage and handbags
products.tags: 303, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Care, Exception Product, Interior Care

products.title: 303 Outdoor Aerospace Protectant - 946mL - 30313
products.body_html:
303 Aerospace Protectant was originally created for use within aerospace and aviation applications but is now used on vehicles, sports equipment, patio furniture accessories and more around the world. This product dries to a clear matte finish, unlike other products that can leave greasy residues. As this product is water-based, it is safe to use on all products, including engine parts and leather seats.

303 Aerospace Protectant protects from harmful UV rays, fading, discolouration and cracking but also serves to repel dust and stains. Protect your vehicle from road grime, dust and soiling with a product that lasts for months at a time. Do not use this product on unfinished leathers, fabrics, floorings, clear plastics, gauge panels or headlights.
products.tags: 303, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Care, Exterior & Tyre Care, Wash, Wax & Polish

products.title: 303 Touchless Sealant - 473mL - 30392
products.body_html:
Have you had trouble finding time to fully wax your car? 303(R) Touchless Sealant will save you hours! This Si02 formula is a completely TOUCHLESS quicker alternative to waxing your vehicle. Simply spray on, and rinse off - it's that easy! It only takes minutes to get that same water beading protection you get from a full wax, saving you hours spent in the garage. It's also great for those looking to prolong the time in between waxes, or ceramic coatings. Safe for clear coat, gel coat, fibreglass, plastics, windshields and wheels too!

303 Touchless Sealant is safe to use on all vehicle exterior surfaces such as:
- Paint
- Clear coat
- Wheels
- Glass
- Plastics
- Fibreglass
- Gel-coat
- Aluminium
- Hard plexiglass

products.title: 50mm Wide Heatshield Exhaust Wrap 3m Black - 322010B
products.body_html:
Exhaust wrap insulation maintains hotter exhaust gases, decreases the gas density, pulling exhaust gas to exit the header or exhaust system faster to increase horsepower, as well as fuel economy. Exhaust wrap can reduce under hood temperatures by up to 50%, keeping your car engine bay noticeably cooler.

To gain the full benefits from increased exhaust scavenging, begin wrapping exhaust wrap at the header pipe next to the cylinder head and progress downstream.

Suggested usage guide for common pipe outer diameters:
- 1 3/8": 0.75m per 30cm (30" of wrap per foot)
- 1 1/2": 0.83m per 30cm (33" of wrap per foot)
- 1 5/8": 0.89m per 30cm (35" of wrap per foot)
- 1 3/4": 0.96m per 30cm (38" of wrap per foot)
- 1 7/8": 1.04m per 30cm (41" of wrap per foot)
- 2": 1.12m per 30cm (44" of wrap per foot)
- 2 1/4": 1.24m per 30cm (49" of wrap per foot)
- 2 1/2": 1.37m per 30cm (54" of wrap per foot)
- 2 3/4": 1.54m per 30cm (60" of wrap per foot)
- 3": 1.65m per 30cm (65" of wrap per foot)
- 3 1/4": 1.78m per 30cm (70" of wrap per foot)
- 3 1/2": 1.93m per 30cm (76" of wrap per foot)
- 3 3/4": 2.06m per 30cm (81" of wrap per foot)
- 4": 2.21m per 30cm (87" of wrap per foot)
products.tags: Boxing Day Sale 2025, Exception Product, Heat Protection, Heatshield, Performance Parts

products.title: AERPRO - Maxcor 1.2M Rca Lead 2M-2M - Mx120 - MX120
products.body_html: MAXCOR RCA's are made from high quality components to ensure you receive blistering performance from your amplifier. All MAXCOR RCA's are double shielded and twisted pair to minimise the risk of signal interference and also feature gold plated connectors to minimise loss of signal. The Soft Touch Super Flex (STSF) PVC insulation throughout the MAXCOR range allows cables to easily bend around tight corners with no loss in performance allowing for a neat and professional installation.The MX120 RCA lead is 1.2m long and offers 2 male connectors on each end. Each connector is marked with a red or black sticker to identify left and right signal during installation. If you are looking for an RCA lead that offers MAXIMUM performance, you can't go past MAXCOR.

products.title: AERPRO 3Dbi 477Mhz Whip Uhf Antenna - CBW30
products.body_html: The Aerpro CBW30 3dBi 477MHz UHF Whip Antenna is compatible with all brands of 477MHz UHF CB Radios in Australia and New Zealand. With 3dBi gain, this low gain antenna has a broad radiation pattern which is best suited for short range communication in highly built up areas including cities, dense woodlands and mountain regions. It produces a wider UHF signal compared to higher gain antennas which is less likely to be impacted by obstructions in these landscapes. The compact 380mm antenna features a high quality whip mounted to an integrated short coil spring which is weather sealed. Its perfect for installing on vehicles that are prone to vibration such as trucks, agricultural machinery and off-road vehicles. The CBW30 is a ground independent antenna and can be mounted virtually anywhere on the vehicle; for the best performance it should be positioned as high as practical. It is fitted with 4.8 metre RG58 coaxial cable which is pre-terminated with an FME connector making it easy to install through the firewall grommet in vehicles. An FME to UHF PL259 screw on adaptor is also included for hassle-free installation.
products.tags: Aerpro, Audio & Connectivity Accessories, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Audio, Dash Cam & Car Audio, Exception Product

products.title: AERPRO 4 Channel Line Output Converter - AP3044A
products.body_html: Aerpro Line Output Converters will convert your existing cars factory head-units high level (speaker output) into a low voltage line level (RCA) output allowing you to add on an aftermarket amplifier to an OEM headunit.
products.tags: Aerpro, Audio & Connectivity Accessories, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Audio, Dash Cam & Car Audio, Exception Product

products.title: Aerpro 4.8A Triple Usb In-Car Charger - APCC300
products.body_html:
The Aerpro APCC300 4.8A Triple USB In-Car Charger allows you to conveniently charge your smartphone, tablet or other USB device right from the accessory socket in your vehicle. Featuring three USB ports, 5V/2.4A USB-A and two 5V/1.2A USB-A ports, it is designed to charge up to three devices at a time. The gloss black & silver finish with a blue LED power indicator light presents a modern and stylish design that will suit the vehicle interior. This charger is 12/24V compatible, making it suitable for use in a wide range of vehicles including cars and trucks.

Specifications:
Number USB Ports: 3
Charge Rate: 4.8 Amp Max
USB Outputs: 5V/2.4A, 2x5V/1.2A
Input Voltage: 12/24V
Colour: Black/Silver
products.tags: Aerpro, Audio & Connectivity Accessories, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Audio, Dash Cam & Car Audio, Exception Product

products.title: Aerpro 4Ga 2-Channel Amp Install Kit BSX204
products.body_html: The BSX204 4GA 2-channel Amp Install Kit can deliver up to 650W to your amplifier, ideal for installing a 2 channel amplifier and includes high quality RCA cables for superior signal strength. Our soft touch super flex (STSF) cable allow easier installation without compromising power and includes high quality components to enhance the performance of your amplifier. The kit includes a 5.5-metre 4GA power cable, 0.8-metre 4GA Earth cable, 5-metre 20GA trigger cable, 120A ANL fuse and fuse holder, 2-channel 5M RCAs, cable ties and fitting terminals.
products.tags: Aerpro, Audio & Connectivity Accessories, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Audio, Dash Cam & Car Audio, Exception Product, Installation Accessories

products.title: Aerpro 5W Wireless Charging 5000mAh Power Bank - APPB100
products.body_html: The Aerpro APPB100 5W wireless charging 5000mAh powerbank is the ideal smartphone accessory for when you are on the move. It is a 2-in-1 5W Qi-enabled wireless charger and 5000mAh powerbank that can wirelessly charge your compatible smartphone and also has a USB-A port for charging non-wireless charging or non-Qi enabled devices.
products.tags: Aerpro, Audio & Connectivity Accessories, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Audio, Dash Cam & Car Audio, Exception Product

products.title: AERPRO 6Dbi 477Mhz Heavy Duty Black Radome Uhf Antenna - CBA6B
products.body_html: The Aerpro CBA6B 6dBi 477MHz Heavy Duty Black Radome UHF Antenna is compatible with all 477MHz UHF CB Radios in Australia and New Zealand. With a 6dBi gain, it offers excellent all-round performance, ideal for medium-range communication in suburban areas, towns, and low-density woodlands. The 1065mm antenna is encased in a high-quality fibreglass tube and mounted on a heavy-duty black-coated stainless steel spring, making it suitable for trucks and 4WDs. Its ground-independent design maintains a stable radiation pattern, while the elevated feed ensures high performance when mounted on a bullbar. It includes a 4.5-meter RG58 coaxial cable with an FME connector for easy installation, an FME to UHF PL259 adaptor, and a mounting spanner. Built for the Australian outback, the CBA6B is a reliable all-purpose antenna for both town and country use.

products.title: Aerpro 720P HD Inspection Camera With 4.3" Display - G9120
products.body_html: The Aerpro G9120 Inspection Camera with large 4.3" colour LCD display is the ideal tool for inspecting hard to reach places. The small 5.2mm waterproof camera with LED light is mounted on a 1.0m flexible shaft, allowing the camera to be positioned virtually anywhere. It has many applications including; viewing around the vehicle engine bay, finding hidden pipes and cables behind walls, identifying blockages in pipes, vents and more. The included attachments can be used to retrieve rings, bolts, nuts and other small items that have fallen into gaps or crevices. This inspection camera can also record footage and take images for future playback and viewing when a micro SD card is installed (not included).

products.title: Aerpro ADMQC2U 36W Dual Port High Output USB-C PD and USB-A QC 3.0 12/24V Fast Charger Adapter
products.body_html:
The Aerpro ADMQC2U 12/24V Dual Port USB power adapter allows you to conveniently fast charge your smartphone, tablet or compatible laptop right from the accessory socket in your vehicle. Featuring one USB-C PD 2.0 port and one USB-A QC 3.0 port, the Aerpro ADMQC2U can charge 2 devices simultaneously. It has a smart IC which ensures the optimal amount of current is distributed between your devices and it can be used in virtually any vehicle as it is 12 and 24 Volt compatible.

Cords not included. For optimum performance, only device manufacturer approved cords should be used.

products.title: AERPRO Aerpro - Maxcor 5.5M Rca Lead 2M-2M(R/A) - Mx555 - MX555
products.body_html: MAXCOR RCA's are made from high quality components to ensure you receive blistering performance from your amplifier. All MAXCOR RCA's are double shielded and twisted pair to minimise the risk of signal interference and also feature gold plated connectors to minimise loss of signal. The Soft Touch Super Flex (STSF) PVC insulation throughout the MAXCOR range allows cables to easily bend around tight corners with no loss in performance allowing for a neat and professional installation. The MX555 RCA lead is 5.5m long and offers 2 male connectors on each end (right angle at one end). Each connector is marked with a red or black sticker to identify left and right signal during installation. If you are looking for an RCA lead that offers MAXIMUM performance, you can't go past MAXCOR.

products.body_html: Introducing the AM10M04, the ultimate 10.36" AHD Quad View Smart Monitor designed to keep you connected and in control. Seamlessly integrate your smartphone using Wireless or Wired Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, transforming this monitor into your all-in-one infotainment hub. products.title: Aerpro AM7CPAAM Dash Mounted Android Auto and Apple CarPlay 7" Touchscreen with Reverse Camera
products.body_html:
Enhance your driving experience with the cutting-edge Aerpro AM7CPAAM 7" wireless smartphone monitor with self-adhesive mount reverse camera. This innovative device serves as a seamless addition to your dashboard, keeping you connected while on the road.

The AM7CPAAM offers wireless smartphone connectivity through both Bluetooth and WiFi, enabling effortless synchronisation with your compatible smartphone. With this wireless connection, you can enjoy the convenience of wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, along with Apple AirPlay and Android Mirror Cast. Stay connected to your favourite apps, access contacts and navigate with ease using the intuitive 7" touchscreen.

With a strong focus on safety and hands-free operation, the AM7CPAAM allows you to take full control of your music, maps, calls and more without any distractions. Experience crystal-clear audio playback through various options, including Bluetooth, FM transmitter or AUX audio out functions. For added convenience, the device even features an inbuilt speaker, ensuring you never miss a beat.

Safety is a top priority, which is why the Aerpro AM7CPAAM comes equipped with a high-definition reverse camera. This essential feature provides a clear view of the area behind your vehicle where your car's mirrors are not sufficient.

Notes:
- The term Wireless refers to the smartphone connection. The display requires connection to the vehicle accessory socket using the included power adaptor. The reverse camera requires connection to the display and a reverse trigger in the vehicle.
- While this product is compatible for use with Apple CarPlay and AirPlay, it is not made or endorsed by Apple. Apple, CarPlay and AirPlay are trademarks of Apple Inc.
- While this product is compatible for use with Android Auto and Mirror Cast, it is not made or endorsed by Google Inc. Android Auto and Mirror Cast are trademarks of Google Inc.
- Other trademarks and trade names are those of their respective owners.
- Compatible smartphone required to enable smartphone connectivity features, smartphone not included.
products.tags: Aerpro, Best Sellers, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Audio, Dash Cam & Car Audio, Stereo Head Unit

products.title: Aerpro AM7M03R 7" Wireless Smartphone Monitor with Reverse Camera
products.body_html:
Enhance your driving experience with the cutting-edge Aerpro AM7M03R 7" Wireless Smartphone Monitor with Reverse Camera (Adhesive Mount). This innovative device serves as a seamless addition to your dashboard, keeping you connected while on the road.

The AM7M03R offers wireless smartphone connectivity, enabling effortless synchronisation with your smartphone. With this wireless connection, you can enjoy the convenience of wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, along with iOS and Android smartphone mirroring. Stay connected to your favourite apps, access contacts and navigate with ease using the intuitive 7" touchscreen.

With a strong focus on safety and hands-free operation, the AM7M03R allows you to take full control of your music, maps, calls and more without any distractions. Experience crystal-clear audio playback through various options, including Bluetooth, FM transmitter or AUX audio out functions. For added convenience, the device even features an in-built speaker, ensuring you never miss a beat.

Safety is a paramount, which is why the Aerpro AM7M03R comes equipped with a reverse camera. This essential feature provides a clear view of the area behind your vehicle, making parking and manoeuvring a breeze.

Upgrade your driving experience today with the Aerpro AM7M03R 7" Wireless Smartphone Monitor with Reverse Camera (Adhesive Mount). Stay connected, stay safe, and enjoy the ultimate convenience on the road.

Important Information:

The term Wireless refers to the smartphone connection. The display requires connection to the vehicle accessory socket using the included power adaptor. The reverse camera requires connection to the display and a reverse trigger in the vehicle.
While this product is compatible for use with Apple CarPlay and AirPlay, it is not made or endorsed by Apple. Apple, CarPlay, AirPlay and iOS are trademarks of Apple Inc.
While this product is compatible for use with Android Auto and Mirror Cast, it is not made or endorsed by Google Inc. Android Auto and Mirror Cast are trademarks of Google Inc.
While this product is compatible for use with Bluetooth, it is not made or endorsed by Bluetooth SIG Inc.
Other trademarks and trade names are those of their respective owners.
Compatible smartphone required to enable smartphone connectivity features, smartphone not included.
Design and specifications are subject to change without notice.
Features:
Stunning 7" HD IPS Touchscreen: Enjoy a large, crystal-clear display that enhances your visual experience while interacting with your favourite apps, maps, and media.
Wireless Smartphone Connectivity: Experience the freedom of wireless connectivity. Effortlessly sync your smartphone and access your apps and content without the hassle of cables.
Compatible with Apple CarPlay & Android Auto (Wireless): Stay connected and entertained with seamless integration for both Apple CarPlay and Android Auto. Access your phone's features through the AM7M03R's interface for a safe and enjoyable drive.
Compatible with Apple AirPlay & Android Mirror Cast: Mirror your smartphone's screen to the AM7M03R using Apple AirPlay or Android Mirror Cast, allowing you to share content with ease.
High-Quality Audio Playback: Immerse yourself in superior sound quality. Choose between Bluetooth, FM transmitter or AUX output functions, which lets you play audio through your car's sound system, or use the inbuilt speaker.
Enhanced Safety with Reverse Camera: Navigate tight spots and park with confidence using the Reverse Camera with a 90 degree wide angle lens and guideline support. Drive with peace of mind and avoid obstacles effortlessly.
Built-in Speaker and Microphone: Make and receive calls while keeping your hands on the wheel with the built-in speaker and microphone. Stay connected while prioritising safety.
Easy Installation and Convenience: The AM7M03R comes with an adjustable angle adhesive display mount and a 12/24V DC compatible Type-C USB car power adapter for hassle-free setup, ensuring you can get on the road quickly and smoothly.

Specs:
Display: 7-inch FHD 1024x600 IPS Capacitive Touchscreen
Wireless Smartphone Connectivity: Supports Apple CarPlay, Android Auto, Apple AirPlay, Mirror Cast
Audio Output: Bluetooth, FM Transmitter, AUX out, Built-in Speaker

Display Mount Type: Adjustable Angle Adhesive Display Mount
Display Size: 182x116x66mm
Reverse Camera: 90 degree wide angle, adjustable guideline support, 6M camera cable

Inclusions:
1 x 7 inch Display
1 x 12/24V DC Compatible Type-C Car Accessory Socket Power Adapter
1 x Adhesive Mount
1 x AUX Cable
1 x Reverse Camera
1 x 6M Camera Cable

The term Wireless refers to the smartphone connection. The display requires connection to the vehicle accessory socket using the included power adaptor. The reverse camera requires connection to the display and a reverse trigger in the vehicle.

products.title: Aerpro AM9M02R 9 Inch Wireless Smartphone Mirror Monitor with Front and Rear Dashcam, and Reverse Camera
products.body_html:
Introducing the Aerpro AM9M02R Smart Mirror Monitor - the all in one solution to provide multiple modern features to your vehicle.
Featuring a sleek 9.66" touch screen display with full or split-screen viewing options, this smart mirror monitor revolutionises your vehicle's functionality. Seamlessly connect your smartphone wirelessly for Apple CarPlay and Android Auto.

With the included 2k QHD front and 1080P HD rear camera, the AM9M02R doubles as a front and rear dashcam, and reverse camera system. The dashcam function allows dual recording, capturing every moment of your journey with crystal-clear clarity. The mirror supports up to 256GB of DVR recording and includes a 32GB SD card. Experience peace of mind on the road with advanced DVR features including loop, impact, and time-lapse recording*. (*Time-lapse recording requires ARVHWK1 hardwire kit, sold separately).

The reverse camera function has overlayed guidelines to assist with parking manoeuvres, or you can activate live-view mode for constant rear vision while driving, perfect for vehicles with obstructed views.

Enjoy audio playback via Bluetooth connection or FM transmission to the factory radio, or alternatively, through the integrated speaker on the mirror monitor. Stay connected and in control with the built-in microphone for accepting phone calls and smart phone voice commands. Powered by supercapacitors and compatible with 12/24V vehicles using the supplied DC power adapter, the AM9M02R is built to enhance your driving experience for years to come.

Designed for convenience, the AM9M02R features a clip-over design with rubber mounting straps for easy installation over your factory rear-view mirror. Please note, it is not designed for round/oval shaped mirrors.

Dimensions: Monitor 72mm(H) x 260mm(W) x 18mm(D)
Rear canera dimensions: 19mm(H) x 24mm(W) x 22mm(L)

Package includes: 6M camera cable (including camera lead), USB lead, 12V/24V charging adapter, 32GB microSD card, mounting screws, adhesive pad for rear camera, mirror protection pads and rubber mounting clips.

Notes:
The term Wireless refers to the smartphone connection. The display requires connection to the vehicle accessory socket using the included power adaptor. The reverse camera requires connection to the display and a reverse trigger in the vehicle.
While this product is compatible for use with Apple CarPlay and AirPlay, it is not made or endorsed by Apple. Apple, CarPlay and AirPlay are trademarks of Apple Inc.

products.title: Aerpro AMFO3 Head Unit Upgrade Kit to Suit Ford Ranger (2015-18) and Everest (2015-17)
products.body_html:
The Aerpro AMFO3 9" Multimedia Receiver with Wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto suits Ford Everest UA (2015-2017) and Ford Ranger PX2 (2015-2018) vehicles with 4.2" factory display. It has a large 9" capacitive touchscreen display which works with the inbuilt wired and wireless Apple CarPlay and Android Auto functions.

It has Bluetooth for hands-free phone calls and wireless audio streaming, dual rear USB inputs as well as an AM/FM radio tuner. Sound quality is superb with 50Wx4 max output, 8 band graphic EQ and time alignment capabilities. Amplifiers can be added to the system via the 4V/5CH RCA pre-outs. Supplied as a complete Head Unit Upgrade Kit, the Aerpro AMFO3 includes all the parts required to complete the installation and retains important vehicle features including steering wheel controls and factory reverse camera (if equipped).

Aerpro's range of stereo head unit upgrade kits enable you to add the latest in-car technology to your vehicle. The kits come supplied with a large screen multimedia receiver head unit and all the parts required to complete the installation including a vehicle specific facia kit, wiring harness and mounting hardware. The kits retain important vehicle features such as steering wheel controls, USB ports, factory amplifiers and factory reverse camera functions (if equipped).

Important information:

  • Suits 4.2" factory display models only
  • Reverse Camera Retention uses the reverse camera input of the head unit
  • Time - date display and trip computer are not supported
  • USB and AUX Inputs are not supported
  • Phone button support requires manual programming in the aftermarket head unit

This kit includes: Aerpro AM9X Multimedia Receiver, black facia kit, steering wheel control interface harness, SWC patch lead, antenna adaptor, camera retention adaptor.

products.title: Aerpro AMPFMT35 4 Channel FM Transmitter
products.body_html:
The Aerpro AMPFMT35 4 Channel FM Transmitter allows you to play your digital audio tracks from MP3 players, iPhones, iPods and smartphones through your car audio system over FM radio.

The AMPFMT35 provides 4 FM frequencies for use, 88.1, 88.3, 88.5 and 88.7 so if you get interference on one channel you can simply flick the switch to use a different channel.

Note: The source device's volume level will affect the output volume and audio quality, we suggest setting the volume of your device no higher than approximately 90% of maximum output.

products.title: Aerpro AP1692F Vehicle Specific Plug to Bare Wire Harness to Suit Selected Ford Falcon EA, EB, ED
products.body_html:
This Aerpro harness plugs into your Ford Falcon's factory headunit wiring system. Allowing for the installation of an aftermarket headunit without the need to remove the factory plug from the vehicle, the Aerpro AP1692F provides colour-coded bare end wires to match standard aftermarket radio wiring looms.

Simply match the wire colours between the AP1692F and your aftermarket headunit wiring loom (supplied with the aftermarket headunit) and hard-wire them together by soldering and insulating with heatshrink (not included).

Please note, this part may have vehicle specific applications. For detailed vehicle application information and to confirm suitability, enter your vehicle details into our Parts Guide search.

products.title: Aerpro AP2001 Vehicle Specific Plug to Bare Wire Harness to Suit Selected Subaru Vehicles
products.body_html:
This Aerpro harness plugs into your Subaru Forester SF, SG; Impreza GC, GD, GG; and Liberty (Legacy) 1989-1994; factory headunit wiring system. Allowing for the installation of an aftermarket headunit without the need to remove the factory plug from the vehicle, Aerpros's AP2001 provides colour-coded bare end wires to match standard aftermarket radio wiring looms. Simply match the wire colours between the AP2001 and your aftermarket headunit wiring loom (supplied with the aftermarket headunit) and hard-wire them together by soldering and insulating with heatshrink (not included).

Please note, this part may have vehicle specific applications. For detailed vehicle application information and to confirm suitability, enter your vehicle details into our Parts Guide search.
products.tags: Aerpro, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Audio, Dash Cam & Car Audio, Installation Accessories, Shop All Parts, Shop All Parts Auto

products.title: Aerpro AP20AQI 10W Qi Wireless Charging Smartphone Holder
products.body_html:
Take your in-vehicle wireless charging experience to the next level with this universal adhesive, suction and vent mount wireless charging smartphone holder, the Aerpro AP20AQI. Thanks to its 10W Qi-Certified wireless charging capabilities, it automatically identifies the charging protocols of the smartphone and delivers the fastest charge rate possible. The holder features a sliding charging coil too, which allows it to align with the smartphone to deliver up to 20% more efficient charge rates compared to other holders.

Wireless charging is delivered safely with the Aerpro AP20AQI as the holder has advanced safety features that detect and prevent any unsafe charging occurrence to avoid damage to the smartphone. It also has a built in indicator light to show the charging status so you can easily determine if it is charging or not.

Using the Aerpro AP20AQI is simple and convenient, it has a built in touch sensor that will open the grip arms and once the phone is positioned in the holder, the grip arms will automatically close and secure the smartphone. With 360 degree rotation and folding foot stand, the smartphone can be positioned horizontally or vertically.

As the kit comes supplied with multiple mounting options, the holder can be mounted virtually anywhere in the vehicle; on the dash board, windscreen or even the air vent. The kit also includes 1.2m USB cable that simply connects to a high current output USB charger (USB charger not included, Quick Charge 3.0 USB chargers recommended for fast charge. USB port must be at least 2.0A).The Aerpro AP20AQI is a feature packed wireless charging smartphone holder that offers the latest technology, it can be mounted in virtually any vehicle in any position and offers a safe and efficient wireless charging solution.-

Important note: Due to ongoing release of new smartphones of increasing size and weight, please note that this mount was designed around an overall device weight of approximately 170 grams. The use of cases adds to the overall weight of a device. Please check your devices's overall weight to ensure suitability. Magnetic mounts (if applicable) are not compatible with wallet style cases.
products.tags: Accessories, Aerpro, Audio & Connectivity Accessories, Boxing Day Sale 2025, Car Audio, Dash Cam & Car Audio, Exception Product

products.title: Aerpro AP218SF Shark Fin Roof Mount Antenna
products.body_html:
This Aerpro 'shark fin' amplified roof mount antenna features:
- Amplify gain: AM 5dB +/- 3dB , FM 6dB +/- 3dB
- Coaxial cable: 75 Ohms
- Power lead and antenna cable length: 20cm
- 5m power lead and antenna cable extension included
- Bolt size: 13mm
